messages.feedbackPrompt: Rate the quality of the answer

logo.text: Bureau of National Statistics of the Agency for Strategic Planning and Reforms of the Republic of Kazakhstan

chat.greeting: Hello! How can I help you?
chat.greetingAlt: Hello! How can I assist you?
chat.sources: Additionally, I attach instructions for the form:
chat.interestingSuggestion: You may also be interested in...

sidebar.warning: Attention: requests older than 7 days are automatically deleted

feedback.goodModalDescription: We are glad you liked it. Would you like to share what you liked in the answer?
feedback.badModalTitle: We are sorry you are not satisfied.
feedback.badModalDescription: We want to improve! Tell us what can be done better.
feedback.requestFeedback: Rate the quality of the answer
feedback.badFeedbackPromptText: Sorry we could not answer your question. Please leave your contact details so our operators can reach out to you for assistance.

messageInput.text: Our bot uses AI and is in testing stage. There may be inaccuracies in answers. If you encounter them, please let us know by filling out the feedback form.
messageInput.textAlt: Information provided by a virtual AI assistant based on the Statistical Business Register. If necessary, we recommend contacting the call center at 1446.

chatError.errorMessage: Sorry, an error occurred. Please rephrase your request.

registration.successMessage: Thank you, your request {{requestId}} has been accepted. Our specialists will contact you shortly.
registration.name: First name
registration.description: Description of your issue, attach screenshots if needed
registration.fileInfo: File must be less than 5 MB.
registration.consent: By clicking "Submit", I consent to the collection, storage, and processing of my personal data specified in this form in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan on personal data protection, for the purpose of reviewing my request and receiving feedback from the Bureau of National Statistics.

deleteChatModal.title: Delete chat
deleteChatModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat? This action is irreversible.
